caption: I simply enjoy their dishes. I always get fantastic customer service there. The place is clean and the cashiers are always kind. Highly recommended.
Worst pizza ever. Bad taste with every bite. Full of oil, bad taste
Delicious pizza! Would recommend 100% close to brick oven, nice thin slices.
Delicious!
Their 'Nduja pizza is an amazing mix of hot, sweet, & savory. #drool
Best Brooklyn pizza
The pizza here is so good. Get the Nduja - best thing ever. I like mine with less cheese so it doesn't get too heavy.
I tried their fried pizza once and was hooked on it ever since. It's amazing!
The fried pizza is amazing no oil at all though it seems to be fried in it, the salad is amazing, and the arancini is like perfection I would recommend this to anyone anytime at all
Very clean and convenient spot. They serve big portions and for inexpensive prices. We enjoyed the meals a lot and the staff members were very personal and explanatory. Highly recommended.
This spot obviously knows how to please their clients. Always with a helpful demeanor. The food is affordably priced, constantly fresh and neat.
Decent food and novel idea. I would not rate them as best. Tradional NY pies are still number 1 in the Big Apple
The service was great and the pizza was fresh and delicious.
Not existing

The pizza was OK, but the guy serving it to me was not.  I asked him a simple yes or no question of, "is the pizza big enough for 2 people to share as a snack?" And instead of giving me a straight answer, he went on about how "its called a personal pizza for a reason".  Meanwhile, it was easily big enough for a nice snack for 2.
One of my preferred places to grab some food. awesome location, well kept, and excellent customer service. I highly recommend them!
Really fresh imported Italian ingredients. Very unique and interesting experience. Dough is deep fried so it's thin and crunchy, and then put into the oven to bake. My favorite is the prosciutto.
Worth the price in the size of pizza. Not real pizza but it tastes good.
Delicious

Ok so first time trying pizza that has been fried first regarding the bread..I must my daughter is the only reason we brought pizza and she made an Excellent decision..pizza was phenomenal and the service was really on point as well we will definitely be going back..feels like a new fav!!!
Food
Best food in the building, hands down

Fast friendly polite service and the pizza is the best and very fresh.They offer many varieties and the honey drizzled over the circle of fried love I was served is the reason why I can't get it out my mind the yumminess I visited that place every time I'm downtown and I'm downtown alot maybe 3-5 days a week. Thanks for the service and the fried circle of love FORCELLA TEAM
Pizza is good and different
This is the best pizza I've ever had.
Friendly staff, clean and place to sit and eat
I Love the Shrimp pineapple fried pizza. The quality and taste is consistent everytime I order and the customer service is Phenomenal 👌🏽😋
Absolutely delicious. Deep fried pizza is spectacular. Pizza. Deep fried. Let me repeat that, deep fried pizza.
The pizza is good pizza but the reason to eat here is the unique crust, which is fried before it's baked. It makes eating the crust at the end that much better
The best pizza ever!!!
Best pizza I ever tried! Perfect for TO GO ! Delicious! Ideal size and unforgettable taste!

I was able to call Forcella at 11pm before my daughter’s birthday party to place a large order and they handled the situation with so much care and ease. My street was blocked off the day of the party and the delivery guy still go our food ordered on time. Both managers (the one I spoke to at night and the one I spoke to in the morning) were so kind. They cut all the pizzas into 8 slices instead of 4 and as usual, the pizzas were delicious. I always loved Forcella but now they’ll definitely be my go to for large orders. Thanks again!
Ordered the nduja pizza, it was LITERALLY the best pizza I have ever had!!!

I was so excited to try this pizza I left a tip on good faith. When I placed my order a minute later I decided to change my pizza since I noticed it wasn’t being prepared yet and was told I could not change my order. When I then asked if my order was being prepared I was ignored. Lastly, after eating this pizza I ended up throwing it up anyway.
Really great tasting pizza. They fry which completely gives it a unique taste!!

Their 'Nduja salami with hot honey pizza was really delicious. The crust is chewy on the inside and crunch on the outside. The pizza was spicy and sweet with good amount of cheese drag. Everything I could ask for in a pizza.
So delicious!

As the name implies, this isn't your standard pizza. I was initially hesitant to try this place, as the words fried pizza conjured together images of an entire pizza somehow deep-fried, but it turned out to be way better.  The pizza dough is fried, then all of the other ingredients (sauce, cheese, etc.) are placed on the pizza and it is finished off in the oven. This results in a really crispy but not overly heavy crust. It was a lot less oily than expected.  I've tried both the plain (tomato sauce, cheese, basil) and the 'ndjuja which comes with spreadable sausage and Mike's Hot Honey - both were great.  As a huge fan of the standard NY slice, I wouldn't say it's objectively better than your usual, but it is most definitely worth trying.

Very apathetic staff.  Mediocre pizza.  Ordered a pepperoni pizza with extra pepperoni.  What they handed me was a standard pepperoni pizza, looked exactly like the picture and the pizza that was ordered before me.  When I asked about it I got a shrug and a grunt asking if I wanted more pepperoni.  I told them I paid for extra, I want what I paid for.  They didn't bother to remake the pizza like someone who takes pride in their work and food.  They tossed some pepperoni in the oven to heat it up and the put that on my pizza, so of course none of it is melted with the cheese or cut.  Tasting the pizza, the dough is cooked, raw dough undercooked.  Nothing special hear and for what they charge you get a better value at a $.99 slice place.
I LOVE THEIR Pizza!!!!
Great. I love this place so much!!
How am I supposed to eat non fried pizza ever again??? Too good, wish there were more locations!! A for sure visit whenever I am in NYC!!
Tastes good. 5 stars but I'll never go back here again. Lol.

The BEST fried pizza in Brooklyn! The fried dough is amazingly tasteful, and the ingredients are always fresh. I have been a Forcella customer since they opened and the quality just gets better and better each time.  The staff is super friendly and helpful. My orders have been always on point and on time.  The montanara flavor is our favorite, but their menu has a little bit of everything for everyone. I recommend the truffle oil on it. In general, Forcella is definitely worth trying if you are ever at Dekalb Market Hall.

Omg guys, the most delicious pizza which I have ever eaten. Scarcely when i had entered to the cafe, I felt the italian atmosphere which catch up my mood and appetite. My friend ordered Vegetable pizza thats why he is vegetarian, and stayed glad of the taste and consistency of pizza. I strongly recommend to visit this place, and I know that I will come there with my family to eat this crispy and mellowly pizza !))
Delicious

Visited Forcella Fried Pizza with friends for lunch just a few days ago and ordered Italian Sausage pizza. Uuhhhh..that crispy dough, appetizing sausage and spongy mozzarella!! The place exactly left one of the best impressions I have ever experienced :) we'll definitely be back and try all of the pizzas one by one!!  P.S. it was the day they were having photo shoot ;)
The best pizza I ever had in Dwntwn Brkln. Staff members and service, toppings and crust, price and atmosphere: everything is perfect.
Great fried pizza.
Great pizza love the food

This place sounds like a cheap idea but instead is one of the most delicate and enjoyable pizzas.  Reasonably priced and with a great array of combos from lemon and ricotta to a divine Mike's Hot honey and Nduja Sausage. Each one is gently friend cresting an airy almost light puffed crust that is then thrown into the high heat oven to get the best of the soft and crunch of both sides of the pizza coin  To get to the point, the mouth feel is spot on. Take a chance and enjoy this one!
One of the best pizzas in bk! Reminds me of pizza that I had in Rome. You can taste the fresh ingredients and the crust is crispy yet soft and chewy.
Friendly staff and a nice selection of small pizzas and sides.

Amazing pizza ! Never had fried before , honestly didn’t even want to try . Then I was assured that it has zero grease , and I can attest to that ! Can’t explain that taste but wow . It’s crispy and tasty and not crispy , you get lots of flavors and consistency of the dough . Another words - need to try for yourself! I know I am hooked on it !

Ten stars if I could. Absolutely one of the best pizzas... The staff and service is A+ and the food even better. Great crust, variety of pizzas - not just your standard topping choices. I will be back to try everything on a menu.
Definitely a must go place! Suggest to all of my pizza lovers. Very tasteful pizza with a crispy crust. Loved it 😍😍
Have had week special pizza with pancetta.. Amazing! Ricotta and basil pesto Arancini that comes with fresh arugula and lovely marinara sauce - perfect as well.
Excellent pizza with a fried airy crust. Quick service. Will definitely come back
I would like to give 7 star not just 5 the service are amazing

This pizza is just not good. Had the meatball and also the mushroom pizza and it was so underwhelming. It was goopy and wet and all of the ingredients just slid right off when you picked it up. The meatball was a good flavor and the dough tasted nice but overall the execution  was terrible.  Pizza should me crisp and not wet. We were out shopping and were going to stop off at Fortina the sit down Italian restaurant because we had packages. Instead we decided to take a chance at Forcella because we never had eaten there before.  The pizza here tasted like they fried the dough but microwaved the cheese unto it. Didn't enjoy this meal. It tasted like cheap stadium food. Was better off getting D'Giornos.

(Translated by Google) it's delicious. Because the dough is fried, the dough is also delicious. Actually, I didn't have a lot of volume, so there was too much in one edition. People who don't have a lot will be able to eat two people in one plate. Because of the large amount, I never thought it was expensive. It is unfortunate compared to Italian oven pizza, but I think this is good in New York.  (Original) 맛있어요. 도우를 튀겨 주기 때문에 도우도 맛납니다. 저는 사실 양이 많은 편이 아니기에 한 판은 너무 많더라고요. 양 많지 않은 사람들은 한 판으로 두명도 먹을 수 있을 듯요. 양이 많아서 저는 비싸다는 생각은 전혀 안 들었어요. 이탈리아 화덕피자에 비하면 아쉽지만 뉴욕에서 이 정도면 굿 이라고 생각합니다.

Delicious pizza spot in the DeKalb market. Highlights include freshly made as you order, including the drying of the dough. Nice options including things like prosciutto and hot honey. Affordable in my opinion. One pizza is enough for a meal. Not big enough for gorging like we all like to do on pizza sometimes. We did the pepperoni which was a classic great. The dough being fried makes it light and fluffy and then the through it in the brick oven which crisps it all up and melts the cheese. The prosciutto was nice. Not to hard to check through like prosciutto can sometimes be. A little light on the balsamic for me so ask for extra if you like balsamic. The croquettes were large and the filling flavorful. I would hit them with some salt right as you get them. Overall a solid option in the middle of a ton of options. They're kind of hidden. I think maybe a fried breadstick sample would solidify people's choice to eat here as the fried pizza sign draws them in.
Amazing pizza, crispy and very delicious.

Just had one of the most amazing pizzas in my life (Tartufo pizza). They make it 10" in size, which is perfect for one person. Also, it's handcrafted and handmade-to-order, very rear these days. You can taste all the freshest ingredients, however, the prices are very reasonable.
One of the best pizza I ever tried🍕🍕 highly recommend 😍
Crispy and delicious
